channel.title: Please Help Meh :D
channel.description:
hey so i am making a raffle system, that chooses a winner every 25 minutes, but uhmm i have like 2 problems.... i have ints like the time for the raffle system, but it doesnt show the same time for all players... when u log in it starts at 25 minutes, not at the same time as everyone else online. and the other problem is, when you enter the lottery, it only sais the total pot is what you only gave, not what the overall total pot is....
heres a pic that might help you understand my problem... (This Is An Allstar Source)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dsrDr6R.png[/img]

item.title: Please Help Meh :D
item.dc:creator: @reaperxscape2 reaperxscape2
item.description:
@reaperxscape2 wrote:

Yeah i know but idk how to make it be a variable for the whole server instead of 1 player, would i have to call it in server.java or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help Meh :D
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

It looks like you are instancing the variables for each player.

item.description:
@reaperxscape2 wrote:

The time and pot ints are both player based, i want to make them global based, the ints are in a new class (GamblingHandler.java)
